name: Network Metadata Model
scope: The network metadata model (NMM) is a generalised entity meant to be able to describe a variety of research networks, network groups or research infrastructures

UUID.Definition: Unique alpha-numeric identifier of the site. The UUID is automatically generated by DEIMS-SDR.
UUID.Recommendation & Hints: The UUID is generated automatically by the system. The UUID is used for creating the URL for the site, e.g. https://deims.org/network/d45c2690-dbef-4dbc-a742-26ea846edf28.

Network name.Definition: Official name identifying the network, network group or research infrastructure.
Network name.Recommendation & Hints: The network name should be concise and precise, e.g. by a given named place. It should not contain unexplained acronyms or abbreviations. It is recommended a maximum length of 200 characters and keeping the similarity with the ‘official naming’ established in the community.

Description of Network.Definition: General description of the network/network group/research infrastructure

Logo.Definition: Image showing a the logo of a network/RI

Web address.Definition: Link to website which provides a description and further information about the network/RI.
Web address.Recommendation & Hints: Web address title - provide a human readable title for the website. Web address URL - provide a URL (http://... or https://..)

Belongs to.Definition: Other networks/network groups or research infrastructure associated

Consists of.Definition: Other networks/network groups or research infrastructure associated
